text: Jonas Lars Björkman (born March 23, 1972, Alvesta, Sweden) is a Swedish professional male tennis player and former World No. 4 in singles and World No. 1 in doubles. He is as of the 2006 season the oldest player in the ATP Top 100 (singles). He has also played in numerous Wimbledon tournaments. ==Other websites== *jonasbjorkman.com - official website Category:Swedish sportspeople Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Male tennis players
title: Jonas Björkman
